nodes.text: Seeja was the wife of veteran holographer and cartoonist Cosweg Budeesho who was active during the Clone Wars. The couple lived together on the planet Ando Prime with their pet Tooka Yari.
Seeja was first mentioned in Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
